resources.string:
ABOUT 


This application will help you to find the right doctor at right place. OPD consultation app provides a description of different departments of hospitals and availability of services . Great initiative by the Ministry of Ayush, this application has been developed for booking an online appointment for Out patient consultation at hospital The OPD consultation application provide a feature and a brief description of an integrated with existing Integrated Hospital Management System which is developed in .net & SQL environment Developed by 

Divyam Makar(TL) 
Abhay Pratap Singh 
Shivansh Amattya 
R.Abhilash 
Ayushi Agarwal 
Dipankar Biswas.
TEAM:-(BAITS FOR BITS)
